title: Mx Claus Dark Skin Tone
alsoKnownAs: gender neutral santa dark skin tone
description: Represents Mx Claus, a gender-neutral figure associated with giving gifts and spreading holiday cheer, depicted with dark skin tone.
apple_vendor_description: Apple’s Mx Claus emoji, rendered with a dark skin tone, presents a joyful and inclusive figure embodying the spirit of the winter holidays. This character is brought to life with Apple’s characteristic vibrant colors, glossy textures, and soft rounded edges, exuding warmth and generosity. The design captures a benevolent smile and a festive demeanor, making it a perfect symbol for holiday cheer, gift-giving, and the inclusive magic of the season.
